casebody.data:
CHRISTOPHER
v.
NC STATE UNIVERSITY. No. 246P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Dahr Joseph Tanoury, Assistant Attorney General, for NC State University.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 661 S.E.2d 36.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of August 2008 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
